queries.query:
insert into TB_DESCONHECIDO_DETAIL( ID_DESCONHECIDO, ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF, VL_DOUBLE, VL_INT, VL_DATE, VL_LONG, VL_STRING,
USER_CREATED, DT_CREATED, DT_ALTERED ) values ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,
?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() )

update TB_DESCONHECIDO_DETAIL set ID_DESCONHECIDO = ?, ID_ARQUIVO_INPUT_COLS_DEF = ?, VL_DOUBLE = ?, VL_INT = ?, VL_DATE = ?, VL_LONG = ?, VL_STRING = ?
USER_ALTERED = ?, DT_ALTERED = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where ID = ?
